propDescriptions.aria-valuetext: A string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current value of the slider.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component. To learn how to add your own colors, check out Themed components—Extend colors.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.disableSwap: If true, the active thumb doesn't swap when moving pointer over a thumb while dragging another thumb.
propDescriptions.getAriaLabel:
Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the thumb labels of the slider. This is important for screen reader users.

Signature:
function(index: number) => string
index: The thumb label's index to format.
propDescriptions.getAriaValueText:
Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current value of the slider. This is important for screen reader users.

Signature:
function(value: number, index: number) => string
value: The thumb label's value to format.
index: The thumb label's index to format.
propDescriptions.isRtl: If true the Slider will be rendered right-to-left (with the lowest value on the right-hand side).
propDescriptions.marks: Marks indicate predetermined values to which the user can move the slider. If true the marks are spaced according the value of the step prop. If an array, it should contain objects with value and an optional label keys.
propDescriptions.max: The maximum allowed value of the slider. Should not be equal to min.
propDescriptions.min: The minimum allowed value of the slider. Should not be equal to max.
propDescriptions.name: Name attribute of the hidden input element.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback function that is fired when the slider's value changed.

Signature:
function(event: Event, value: number | Array<number>, activeThumb: number) => void
event: The event source of the callback. You can pull out the new value by accessing event.target.value (any). Warning: This is a generic event not a change event.
value: The new value.
activeThumb: Index of the currently moved thumb.
propDescriptions.onChangeCommitted:
Callback function that is fired when the mouseup is triggered.

Signature:
function(event: React.SyntheticEvent | Event, value: number | Array<number>) => void
event: The event source of the callback. Warning: This is a generic event not a change event.
value: The new value.
propDescriptions.scale:
A transformation function, to change the scale of the slider.

Signature:
function(x: any) => any
propDescriptions.size: The size of the component. It accepts theme values between 'sm' and 'lg'. To learn how to add custom sizes to the component, check out Themed components—Extend sizes.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside. See Slots API below for more details.
propDescriptions.step:
The granularity with which the slider can step through values. (A "discrete" slider.) The min prop serves as the origin for the valid values. We recommend (max - min) to be evenly divisible by the step.
When step is null, the thumb can only be slid onto marks provided with the marks prop.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.tabIndex: Tab index attribute of the hidden input element.
propDescriptions.track:
The track presentation:
- normal the track will render a bar representing the slider value. - inverted the track will render a bar representing the remaining slider value. - false the track will render without a bar.
propDescriptions.value: The value of the slider. For ranged sliders, provide an array with two values.
propDescriptions.valueLabelDisplay:
Controls when the value label is displayed:
- auto the value label will display when the thumb is hovered or focused. - on will display persistently. - off will never display.
propDescriptions.valueLabelFormat:
The format function the value label's value.
When a function is provided, it should have the following signature:
- {number} value The value label's value to format - {number} index The value label's index to format
propDescriptions.variant: The global variant to use. To learn how to add your own variants, check out Themed components—Extend variants.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

marked.conditions: marks is provided with at least one label

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.track: The component that renders the track.
slotDescriptions.rail: The component that renders the rail.
slotDescriptions.thumb: The component that renders the thumb.
slotDescriptions.mark: The component that renders the mark.
slotDescriptions.markLabel: The component that renders the mark label.
slotDescriptions.valueLabel: The component that renders the value label.
slotDescriptions.input: The component that renders the input.
